ValidationRule.description: Will verify that the name of the sprint fits the following format: 20YY.MM[a-z] - <letters>
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( NOT( CONTAINS( "2", LEFT(Name, 1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS( "0", MID(Name, 2, 1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS( "0123456789", MID(Name, 3, 1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS( "0123456789", MID(Name, 4, 1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS(".", MID(Name, 5,1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS( "0123456789", MID(Name, 6, 1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS( "0123456789", MID(Name, 7, 1) ) ), NOT( CONTAINS(" abcdef0123456789", MID(Name, 8,1) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your sprint should follow the format: YYYY.MM(0-9 or a-f) - <Team Name>4 digit year, 2 digit month, optional (0-9 or a-f) - <your team name>
